actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill relating to benefits for employees of the Government of the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.

summary.text: District of Columbia Personnel Act - Authorizes the Commissioner of the District of Columbia to designate District government employees to administer the oath of office to civil officers of the District. Prohibits a setoff from Civil Service annuity payments or refunds to liquidate debts owed the District or the Federal Government unless the tax indebtness has first been reduced to judgment through court procedures. Makes provisions for the waiver by the District of Columbia government of claims for overpayment of pay to an employee where the collection would be against equity and good conscience. Authorizes the Commissioner to provide transportation in emergency situations and where necessary for good cause to employees working in municipal facilities outside the District of Columbia. Repeals the provision of law which exempted the Recorder of Deeds of the District of Columbia from the prohibition on political activities by Federal or District employees.

titles.title: A bill relating to benefits for employees of the Government of the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.
